title: Using the {ProductName} command-line interface
subtitle: Preparing your applications for modernization and migration by using the {ProductName} command-line interface

abstract.para: By using the {ProductFullName} command-line interface (CLI), you can assess and prioritize migration and modernization efforts for applications written in different languages. You can use the CLI to customize {ProductShortName} analysis options or integrate with external automation tools. You can also use the {ProductShortName} CLI to generate the manifests needed to deploy a Cloud Foundry (CF) application on Red Hat OpenShift.
